questions.question: Describe what this feature does and the problem it solves
questions.description: Concise explanation of the feature's purpose

questions.question: Who is this feature for?
questions.description: Primary users who will benefit
questions.placeholder: e.g., Mobile app users, Admins, New customers

questions.question: What pain does this feature remove?
questions.description: The specific problem or frustration being solved

questions.question: Why does this feature matter to the business?
questions.description: Expected impact on metrics, revenue, retention, etc.

questions.question: What are the goals of this feature?
questions.description: List what success looks like and the outcomes this feature should achieve

questions.question: What is intentionally out of scope (non-goals)?
questions.description: What this feature will NOT do or solve

questions.question: Provide real-world user scenarios
questions.description: Describe situations where the feature will be used

questions.question: Outline the main user flow
questions.description: Step-by-step interaction from the user's perspective

questions.question: List the functional requirements
questions.description: Clear, testable statements of what the system must do

questions.question: Define the business rules
questions.description: Logic and constraints governing the feature

questions.question: Identify edge cases and error handling
questions.description: Non-happy paths, failures, and recovery

questions.question: Security & compliance considerations
questions.description: Security, privacy, and regulatory requirements

questions.question: Analytics & tracking events
questions.description: Events and metrics to measure usage and success

questions.question: Acceptance criteria
questions.description: Conditions that must be met for the feature to be considered complete

questions.question: Out of scope items
questions.description: Explicitly excluded functionality

questions.question: Open questions
questions.description: Unresolved questions that need answers

questions.question: Rollout & release plan
questions.description: How the feature will be released

questions.question: Primary persona
questions.description: Main user type who will interact with the feature
questions.placeholder: e.g., Power User Paula, Admin Andy

questions.question: Secondary persona (if any)
questions.description: Additional user type impacted

questions.question: Internal / Admin persona (if applicable)
questions.description: Internal users who manage or support the feature

questions.question: Describe UI / UX expectations
questions.description: Screens, components, states, and accessibility needs

questions.question: List internal and external dependencies
questions.description: Anything this feature relies on

questions.question: List known risks and their mitigations
questions.description: Add each risk with impact and mitigation strategy

questions.question: What is the name of the feature?
questions.description: A clear, descriptive name for the feature
questions.placeholder: e.g., Smart Notifications, Bulk Export, AI Insights

questions.question: Link to the Product Requirements Document (PRD)
questions.description: URL to the related PRD

questions.question: Link to the Product Roadmap
questions.description: URL to the product roadmap

questions.question: Link to the Jira Epic or Ticket
questions.description: URL to the Jira epic or ticket

questions.question: Link to Design Files (Figma)
questions.description: URL to Figma or other design files
